questions: Is there anything I won’t be able to do when I have my period?
Is having a heavy flow in periods normal?
answers: Your period doesn’t have to stop you from doing things you usually do. You can still go to school, help at home, see your friends, play sports and do all the things you’d normally do
You may pass blood clots the size of a quarter or even larger. Menstrual bleeding that's so heavy that it interferes with your daily life is never normal
